Interested In A Franchisee?
Thanks for being a fan of our Brand! At this time we are not offering franchise opportunities. While these opportunities have stopped, we havent stopped actively expanding our corporately owned footprint.
A Store Was Missing My Favorite Flavor!
While generally store flavor line-ups are consistent, there can be some variations due to space, delivery, and regulatory considerations. We love to hear about the cravings of our fans and will continue to provide the best experience possible to our customers.
What Are Your Hours Of Operations?
We're always here for you, except for when we're closed. For more information on store addresses, hours, and phone numbers, please visit
https://fattuesday.com/locations
Refund, Tips, or Receipt.

Can I Place An Online Order?
Unfortunately, after careful consideration, we are no longer selling our products online. Please visit
https://fattuesday.com/locations
to find a list of our store locations where you can enjoy our frozen cocktails and more.
How Can I Discuss A Donation Request?
We appreciate your interest in our Brand, please send us an e-mail to: hr@fat-tuesday.com
Can I Make A Reservation For An Event Or Sponsorship?
We appreciate your interest in our Brand! Please send us an e-mail to marketing@ fat-tuesday.com with detailed information about your proposal.
What Payment Methods Do You Accept?
We accept cash, Fat Tuesday gift cards, all major credit and debit cards, and tap to pay.
Where Are Refills Available?
We'd love to see you again! Refills are available at most locations as may be permitted by law. Please call ahead to the store you're visiting to confirm if they have refills, and remember we'll only refill a souvenir cup!
Where Can I Find Job Opportunities?
We're always looking to build our team with more amazing personalities! Please visit our career page at
http://www.fattuesday.com/careers
Do You Sell Or Rent Machines?
We are flattered you love us so much to consider buying a Fat Tuesday machine! Unfortunately we do not sell our machines or mixes.
Accident/Incident Inside The Store.
